product_name: REI Sariska Drape Cardigan Sweater - Women's
long_description: With convertible styling you can wear open or button across the shoulder, the REI Sariska Drape Cardigan sweater offers soft fabric and just-right coverage to keep you warm on your way to yoga. Polyester and rayon blend provides a very soft feel with a natural drape that fits right in with light exercise. The women's REI Sariska Drape Cardigan offers a classic fit that's perfect for easy wear. Different weave directions of fabric provide visual interest. 27 in. back length.
short_description: With convertible styling you can wear open or button across the shoulder, the REI Sariska Drape Cardigan sweater offers soft fabric and just-right coverage to keep you warm on your way to yoga.
